channel.title: Compiler Help - Impozzes 317/641
channel.description:
[code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src/server/gui/*.java pause[/code]
I keep getting that it can't find the path specified.
I have JAVA 7u25. [img]http://i.imgur.com/rDuWxnn.png[/img]

item.title: Compiler Help - Impozzes 317/641
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

The Java you have installed is only the run time, you must download the development kit to utilize the compiler.

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html

That link is for the development kit, install that then it should work. Depending on the version you download you may have to change the path in the compiler batch script, if you download the 32bit version it will go into the Program Files (x86) folder, if you download the 64bit version it will go into the regular Program Files folder. If you have any other questions just post!

[quote=“du arwi, post:4, topic:523935”]try any of these
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\javac.exe”
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe”
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe”
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\javac.exe”
if none of these work uninstall all java files and try again[/quote]

When you download just Jre7 you get the run time, you don’t get the compiler. You must have the development kit in order to develop programs.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help - Impozzes 317/641
item.dc:creator: @du_arwi du arwi
item.description:
@du_arwi wrote:

try any of these
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\javac.exe”
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe”
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_25\bin\javac.exe”
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre7\bin\javac.exe”
if none of these work uninstall all java files and try again

@Xhyst wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:2, topic:523935”]“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_21\bin\javac.exe”

You must change the 21 to 25.[/quote]

I did and it still says the same thing…

When I go to my Program Files and to the Java folder, it’s says Jre7, and this is the Jre7 Folder open.
